metadata.Title: CVE-2019-8287 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description: TightVNC code version 1.3.10 contains global buffer overflow in HandleCoRREBBP macro function, which can potentially result code execution. This attack appear to be exploitable via network connectivity. It was discovered that TightVNC  contains global buffer overflow vulnerability. A attacker could use it to provoke a Denial of Service or even a remote code execution.

criterions.comment: tightvnc package in impish is affected and needs fixing.
